title: New: Favela – Future Visions
content:
Having released a handful of tracks across the course of the past couple of years, Leeds singer/producer Favela has finally found a home, with Transgressive Records.

With the news of 12″ EP out 29 June, featuring two new tracks, alongside last year’s Gong, it appears that Favela is now ready to spread his wings. EP opener, Future Visions, is his most soulful release to date, part SOHN, part Rhye – drawing on smooth R&B influences as much as anything. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
